readable.title: 3514179514_cbc3371b92
readable.content: A baseball player attempts to catch a ball while another runs towards the base . A baseball player catches the ball while the batter reaches the base . A baseman tries to catch a ball while a runner tries to make the base in a community game . An umpire in a baseball game crouches to catch a ball while an opposing team member runs to homebase . Two children are playing baseball
